text: Tamás Cseri (born 15 January 1988) is a Hungarian football player who currently plays for Mezőkövesdi SE. ==Club career== On 15 July 2017 he was signed by Nemzeti Bajnokság I club Mezőkövesdi SE. ==International career== He made his Hungary national football team debut on 6 September 2020 at the age of 32 in a Nations League game against Russia.
